attributes.action: Establish an annual moment of silence to commemorate the victims of Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: The very least we can do to acknowledge the suffering and hardship the world has seen in 2020 is to create a new moment of silence to remember those who have lost their lives.
attributes.background: Establish an annual moment of silence across the nation in order to commemorate those who lost their lives to Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Hold a national 1 minute silence for those who have died of Covid-19 on 23/3/21: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565292

An annual day of remembrance and memorial for the victims of the COVID-19 virus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561869
